description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              -      Service and commissioning for automotive test systems, powertrain and vehicle test bed systems and measuring instruments.
              
              -      The employment will be with our office in Hanoi but the job requires extensive traveling in Asia and other countries too.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              •	Degree in Electronics, Metrology, Automation and Control, Mechatronics or similar.
              
              •	Minimum 2 years of experience in service or commissioning of industrial machinery and equipment, broad experience preferred rather than specialized knowledge.
              
              •	Experience preferably with international company, in the automotive industry or other investment goods industries.
              
              •	Good command of spoken and written English.
              
              •	Driver license required (intl. preferred)
              
              •	Strong analytical thinking and trouble shooting skills.
              
              •	Able to work independently, be customer support oriented and be committed to customer satisfaction.
              
              •	Must be able to work in a multicultural environment and able to travel abroad also for long   period.
              
              •	Open minded, flexible and self-reliant.
              

              Note: CVs and application letters must be in English (Can translate without notarization)
              
              Interested candidates please submit your complete resume via VietnamWorks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Attractive salary and bonus
               







                Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance according to Labor Laws
               







                Good chance to study and develop career path stably
